caption: The photograph shows a warning sign prominently positioned in the foreground on dirt ground. The sign reads: "UNAUTHORIZED PERSONNEL KEEP OUT - RADIOLOGICAL RESEARCH PROPOSAL FARM - EPA". It is written in bold, black letters against a white background. To the right of the sign is a dirt road with a shadow falling onto it that appears to be cast by the sign itself. Beyond the road, there are several scattered industrial structures, including what looks like tanks or silos. A distant landscape is visible in the background with clear skies and a few sparse hills, evoking a remote or isolated setting. The overall look of the photo suggests a restricted or controlled area likely used for experimental purposes.
title: Experimental farm operated by EPA's Las Vegas National Research Center
